summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3690 for the improvement of East 62nd Street, from 15th Avenue Northeast to 20th Avenue Northeast; by widening the existing roadway, grading and graveling, and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 45456, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
